channel.title: Credit Slips on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Credit Slips on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: View credit notes
item.description: Credit notes3 sections are present in this page Settings wheel Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded. Show SQL query After clicking on it, the SQL query is displayed in a modal. The SQL query takes into account filters and sorts that have been done. There are two buttons: Close: After clicking on it, the modal is closed Export to SQL Manager: After clicking on it, the SQL query is opened in Advanced parameters > Database > SQL Manager Export to SQL Manager After clicking on it, the SQL query is opened in Advanced parameters > Database > SQL Manager
